movie.title: 009-1: The End of the Beginning
movie.actors: Mayuko Iwasa, Minehiro Kinomoto, Nao Nagasawa, Mao Ichimichi
movie.plot: Marking the 75th anniversary of his birth, Shotaro Ishinomori's classic spy heroine manga "009-1" has been adapted into a live-action motion picture for the first time ever.
